name: dynapp-localization
description: A app that makes it simpler to localize your apps built with Dynapp developed by WIP

commands.title: Dynapp: Convert all string to messages

dynapp-localization.defaultlanguage.name: Default language
dynapp-localization.defaultlanguage.description: Default language extension to use, like 'en', 'sv' or other. Leave blank for messages.properties

dynapp-localization.dataitempath.name: Data items path
dynapp-localization.dataitempath.description: Folder of dynapp data items relative to project root

dynapp-localization.messagesprefix.name: Message properties prefix
dynapp-localization.messagesprefix.description: The prefix for message.properties file, example 'dync-register'

dynapp-localization.annotationcolor.name: Annotation color
dynapp-localization.annotationcolor.description: Color of the text that is places after localized variables

dynapp-localization.prefillvalue.name: Prefill value
dynapp-localization.prefillvalue.description: Prefill for the key selection dialog

dynapp-localization.languagePostfixes.name: language postfixes
dynapp-localization.languagePostfixes.description: Language postfixes to use, empty will result in 'messages.properties'. 'sv' will result in messages_sv.properties. Also controls priority of checking
